short_definition: One who procures, counsels or commands the deed perpetrated, but who is not actively present at such perpetration.
long_definition_html: One who procures, counsels or commands the deed perpetrated, but who is not actively present at such perpetration.
long_definition_markdown: One who procures, counsels or commands the deed perpetrated, but who is not actively present at such perpetration.
long_definition_text: One who procures, counsels or commands the deed perpetrated, but who is not actively present at such perpetration.
